utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hello everyone! I'm Sarah Johnson, and I'll be your host today.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi Sarah! My name is David Lee. Thanks for having me on the show.

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: It's great to have you here, David. Let's start with your background.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure, Sarah. I've been working in software engineering for about ten years now.

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That's impressive, David. What got you interested in this field?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well, Sarah, I've always been fascinated by technology and problem-solving.
